source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'OPS_TIMBER_SALES_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Timber_Sales]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Timber_Sale_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Species_Code as string,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_Export as string,
		Product_Type_Code as string,
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Unit_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Currency_Code as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Timber_Sale_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Species_Code as string,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_Export as string,
		Product_Type_Code as string,
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Unit_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Currency_Code as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalOpsTimberSales
GenerateStagingChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		StagingChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectStagingData
SelectNewRecordData derive(insert_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
RelationalOpsTimberSales derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Species_Code,Customer,Domestic_Export,Product_Type_Code,Price_Point_Code,Sales_Unit_Code,Sales_Quantity,Sales_Revenue,Production_Cost,Stumpage,Unit_Stumpage,Currency_Code)) ~> GenerateRelationalChecksum
GenerateRelationalChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Timber_Sale_ID = Timber_Sale_ID,
		Relation_Reporting_Period = Reporting_Period,
		Relation_Species_Code = Species_Code,
		Relation_Customer = Customer,
		Relation_Domestic_Export = Domestic_Export,
		Relation_Product_Type_Code = Product_Type_Code,
		Relation_Price_Point_Code = Price_Point_Code,
		Relation_Sales_Unit_Code = Sales_Unit_Code,
		Relation_Sales_Quantity = Sales_Quantity,
		Relation_Sales_Revenue = Sales_Revenue,
		Relation_Production_Cost = Production_Cost,
		Relation_Stumpage = Stumpage,
		Relation_Unit_Stumpage = Unit_Stumpage,
		Relation_Currency_Code = Currency_Code,
		Relation_Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime,
		Relation_Update_Datetime = Update_Datetime,
		Relation_Process_Name = Process_Name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalData
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Reporting_Period,Species_Code,Customer,Domestic_Export,Product_Type_Code,Price_Point_Code,Sales_Unit_Code,Sales_Quantity,Sales_Revenue,Production_Cost,Stumpage,Unit_Stumpage,Currency_Code)) ~> GenerateStagingChecksum
SelectStagingData, SelectRelationalData lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID
	&& Timber_Sale_ID == Relation_Timber_Sale_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> CompareKeys
AddAuditColumns, SelectChangeRecord union(byName: true)~> UnionNewAndExisting
NewAndExistingTimberSales@NewTimberSales select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNewRecordData
UnionNewAndExisting alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowUpsert
CompareKeys split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> NewAndExistingTimberSales@(NewTimberSales, ChangedTimberSales, ExistingNoChange)
NewAndExistingTimberSales@ChangedTimberSales derive(update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> ChangedAddAuditData
ChangedAddAuditData select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID = Relation_Timber_Sale_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		insert_datetime = Relation_Insert_Datetime,
		update_datetime,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectChangeRecord
AlterRowUpsert sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Timber_Sale_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Species_Code as string,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_Export as string,
		Product_Type_Code as string,
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Unit_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Currency_Code as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Timber_Sale_ID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Insert_Datetime = insert_datetime,
		Update_Datetime = update_datetime,
		Process_Name = process_name
	)) ~> UpserttRow

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Timber_Sale_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Species_Code as string,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_Export as string,
		Product_Type_Code as string,
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Quantity as string,
		Sales_Revenue as string,
		Production_Cost as string,
		Stumpage as string,
		Unit_Stumpage as string,
		Currency_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
source(output(
		Species_Code as string,
		Species as string,
		Species_Group as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalSpeciesType
source(output(
		Product_Type_Code as string,
		Product_Type as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalProductType
source(output(
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalPricePoint
source(output(
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalSalesUnit
ValidatedTimberSalesIDandDateandDecimal@ValidDateAndTimberSalesIDandNumbers, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationAsset
IsValidSalesUnit@ValidSalesUnit select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID = Derived_Timber_Sales_ID,
		Reporting_Period = Derived_Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity = Derived_Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue = Derived_Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost = Derived_Production_Cost,
		Stumpage = Derived_Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage = Derived_Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndTimberSalesID split(not(isNull(Derived_Timber_Sales_ID)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)) && 
iif(not(isNull(Sales_Quantity)),not(isNull(Derived_Sales_Quantity)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Sales_Revenue)),not(isNull(Derived_Sales_Revenue)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Derived_Production_Cost)),not(isNull(Production_Cost)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Stumpage)),not(isNull(Derived_Stumpage)),true()) &&
iif(not(isNull(Unit_Stumpage)),not(isNull(Derived_Unit_Stumpage)),true()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedTimberSalesIDandDateandDecimal@(ValidDateAndTimberSalesIDandNumbers, InvalidDateOrTimberSlaesIDOrNumbers)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Timber_Sales_ID = toInteger(Timber_Sale_ID),
		Derived_Sales_Quantity = toDecimal(Sales_Quantity, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Sales_Revenue = toDecimal(Sales_Revenue, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Production_Cost = toDecimal(Production_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Stumpage = toDecimal(Stumpage, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Unit_Stumpage = toDecimal(Unit_Stumpage, 19, 4, "###,###.####")) ~> ConvertDateAndTimberSalesID
InvalidDateOrTimberSalesIDOrNumbererrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID = Derived_Timber_Sales_ID,
		Reporting_Period = Derived_Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity = Derived_Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue = Derived_Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost = Derived_Production_Cost,
		Stumpage = Derived_Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage = Derived_Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrTimberSlaesIDOrNumbers
ValidatedTimberSalesIDandDateandDecimal@InvalidDateOrTimberSlaesIDOrNumbers derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Reporting Period  / Timber Sales ID / Sales Quantity / Sales Revenue / Production Cost / Stumpage / Unit Stumpage")) ~> InvalidDateOrTimberSalesIDOrNumbererrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID = Derived_Timber_Sales_ID,
		Reporting_Period = Derived_Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity = Derived_Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue = Derived_Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost = Derived_Production_Cost,
		Stumpage = Derived_Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage = Derived_Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrTimberSlaesIDOrNumbers, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset, SelectInvalidSpeciesType, SelectInvalidProductType, SelectInvalidPricePoint, SelectInvalidSalesUnit union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset, SelectRelationalSpeciesType lookup(Species_Code == Relation_Species_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalSpeciesType
RelationalSpeciesType select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Species_Code = Species_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalSpeciesType
LookupRelationalSpeciesType split(not(isNull(Relation_Species_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsValidSpeciesType@(ValidSpeciesType, InvalidSpeciesType)
IsValidSpeciesType@InvalidSpeciesType derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Species Code")) ~> InvalidSpeciesTypeerrormessage
InvalidSpeciesTypeerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID = Derived_Timber_Sales_ID,
		Reporting_Period = Derived_Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity = Derived_Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue = Derived_Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost = Derived_Production_Cost,
		Stumpage = Derived_Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage = Derived_Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidSpeciesType
RelationalProductType select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Product_Type_Code = Product_Type_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalProductType
RelationalPricePoint select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Price_Point_Code = Price_Point_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalPricePoint
RelationalSalesUnit select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Sales_Unit_Code = Sales_Unit_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalSalesUnit
IsValidSpeciesType@ValidSpeciesType, SelectRelationalProductType lookup(Product_Type_Code == Relation_Product_Type_Code,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalProductType
LookupRelationalProductType split(not(isNull(Relation_Product_Type_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsValidProductType@(ValidProductType, InvalidProductType)
IsValidProductType@InvalidProductType derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Product Type")) ~> InvalidProductTypeerrormessage
InvalidProductTypeerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID = Derived_Timber_Sales_ID,
		Reporting_Period = Derived_Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity = Derived_Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue = Derived_Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost = Derived_Production_Cost,
		Stumpage = Derived_Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage = Derived_Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidProductType
IsValidProductType@ValidProductType, SelectRelationalPricePoint lookup(Price_Point_Code == Relation_Price_Point_Code,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupPricePoint
LookupPricePoint split(not(isNull(Relation_Price_Point_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsValidPricePoint@(ValidPricePoint, InvalidPricePoint)
IsValidPricePoint@ValidPricePoint, SelectRelationalSalesUnit lookup(Sales_Unit_Code == Relation_Sales_Unit_Code,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupSalesUnit
LookupSalesUnit split(not(isNull(Relation_Sales_Unit_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsValidSalesUnit@(ValidSalesUnit, InvalidSalesUnit)
IsValidPricePoint@InvalidPricePoint derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Price Point")) ~> InvalidPricePointerrormessage
InvalidPricePointerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID = Derived_Timber_Sales_ID,
		Reporting_Period = Derived_Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity = Derived_Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue = Derived_Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost = Derived_Production_Cost,
		Stumpage = Derived_Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage = Derived_Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidPricePoint
IsValidSalesUnit@InvalidSalesUnit derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Sales Unit Code")) ~> InvalidSaleUniterrormessage
InvalidSaleUniterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID = Derived_Timber_Sales_ID,
		Reporting_Period = Derived_Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity = Derived_Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue = Derived_Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost = Derived_Production_Cost,
		Stumpage = Derived_Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage = Derived_Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidSalesUnit
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Timber_Sale_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Species_Code as string,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_Export as string,
		Product_Type_Code as string,
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Production_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Unit_Stumpage as decimal(19,4),
		Currency_Code as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Timber_Sale_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species_Code,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product_Type_Code,
		Price_Point_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB
